description: Hotter temperatures are forcing families in southern India to decide: Try to survive here, or leave?
title: The Uninhabitable Village
title_page: The Uninhabitable Village - The New York Times
maintext: K. Muthu and her husband, N. Kumar, have stayed. But they never know when they will get water next. Food is scarce, and theyâ€™ve had to sell timber to make ends meet.
